title: Bostonian
body:
A/n: A continuation of Vermonter but can be read on its own.

It had been quite a while since you had met the guy -Chris- at the cafe. You had only assumed that he had finally gotten some sense knocked into him and he returned back to Boston. It seemed like the only logical situation.

You brushed some of your hair that had fallen in your face. Although it had been in the low fifties, you still decided to wear your favorite fluffy hat. You covered your ears under part of the grey hat.

You had realized that in the process of adjusting the hat that a stray cab had taken an illegal right. You heard people start to yell something at you, but you had no idea why.

It must be something that New Yorkers did to random strangers.

You only heard the screeching of tires and a flash of yellow as you were thrown to the ground. You impulsively squeezed your eyes, waiting for your death. Except it never happened. You heard something beneath you groan as you rolled to the side.

You opened your eyes as you laid on the pavement, cars stopping the middle of the road check if you were okay. As you glanced to the side to see what saved you, you were meet with the same vibrant eyes that you had seen back at the cafe.

“You know when I told you to not hit anyone on the way out, I didn’t mean for you to go and get hit by a taxi,” He said, pushing himself off of the ground. As soon as he got up, he offered his hand to you and pulled you up. You both started to walk back down the street, not really knowing where you were going. Not caring either.

“I didn’t think I’d ever see you again,” You said, laughing slightly. You didn’t mean for it to be funny. You were generally disappointed that you were probably never going to see him again.

He must have noticed how much of a double-edged sword your words were because, when you glanced up at him, his lips had curved downwards to form a frown.

“The Patriots won,” You blurted out in a desperate attempt to put some happiness back into the conversation. As soon as you did, you blushed beet red. You heard him start to huff slightly before it turned into a full deep boisterous laughter. You couldn’t help a smile from creeping across your lips.

“That they did,” He replied after the laughter dies down, “You watch the game?”

You let out a dramatic gasp, falling onto the nearest tree as you clutched your heart. You flopped your head to the side as you said,

“You wound me, kind sir,”

He laughed again, bowing deeply as you pushed yourself back up. He grabbed your hand and brought it up to his lips, kissing it gently.

“My apologies, madam,” He said, almost seamlessly adopting an excellent British accent. You brought your hand, laying it on your heart.

“How will I ever forgive you? I should have known seen it coming. After all, you are a Bostonian,” You mocked disgust, marching away. You felt as he ran to catch up with you and stand in front of you.

“Dear Lady, do forgive me. I am but a humble Bostonian,” He said, getting on his knees to beg. You covered your mouth to stop the laughter from leaking out. He grabbed one of your arms and peered at you from under his eyelashes.

“Get off your knees,” You commanded, “I forgive you. However, if you assume that I will not watch my favorite lumberjack win MVP again, then you will have to do more than begging,”

He jumped to his feet before the two of your burst out into laughter. You felt him link your arms together. You leaned into his arm, letting him lead the way. As you looked around you, there started to be an influx of cameras and people who were joining you on the sidewalk.

You looked up at Chris who didn’t seem to notice much. He looked relatively calm. It wasn’t until people started to shout at him a certain name that you knew something was wrong.

Chris Evans…

tags: chris evans x plus size reader
title: One shot: Unpleasant discovery
body:
Requested?    Yes  l   No

By: anonymous

Pairing: Chris Evans x Black plus sized reader

Summary: Hi, I was the Chris Evans meeting family anon. Have you done one where reader and Chris are dating and introduces her to the cast and come to find out she used to date Chadwick? And Chris is all salty about it? 😂 if you do it could she please be black? Thank you!

Warning(s): none

Word count: 1413

Picture(s) found on: Pinterest/Google

“Gosh, I’m so excited!” you squealed while hopping out of Chris’s car and adjusting your dress, feeling so pumped that you were about to meet the Marvel cast. Your boyfriend let out an amused chuckle while copying your actions and locking the car before walking over to you and taking your hand in his.

The two of you shared a quick kiss before walking towards the restaurant, your heart pounded in your chest while you tried to look calm and collective. You stifled a squeal when you squinted your eyes and saw the cast sitting far in the back of the restaurant, everybody laughing and smiling.

Chris led you to them with a proud smile on his face as he had been talking about you nonstop. Everybody was so excited to finally meet the woman who had Chris Evans head over heels in love. Ever since he had gotten together with you, it was like he had evolved into the best version of himself. He realized that the things he used to worry about weren’t as serious as they seemed, you helped him see the true beauty in love and life and he couldn’t be more grateful for that.

You shot the actor a quick smile and squeezed his hand before letting go of it as you had reached the table and Scarlett being the first person to warmly greet you with a hug and kisses on the cheeks. “Oh my god, it’s so nice to finally meet you!” the actress happily addressed while the rest of the cast was grinning and wiggled their eyebrows at Chris as it was so obvious that he had a beautiful big and black goddess as his girlfriend.

While you took your turn in greeting and hugging the whole cast, your heart dropped to the pit of your stomach when you faced Chadwick, your ex-boyfriend of two years. The two of you broke up due to you losing your feelings for one another. There had never been the hot and buzzing chemistry in between you and Chadwick, you simply went from friends to friends with benefits and then to a couple. But that was six years ago.

You had been with Chris for three years and knew that he was the love of your life, the only issue was that you had never told the actor about your relationship with Chadwick. A part of you knew that it wasn’t good to keep the tiny secret away from your boyfriend, but the other part of you always panicked when you even thought about confessing it to Chris.

“Hey, long time no see” Chadwick gave you a polite smile before sitting back at the table next to Lupita and Danai. You faked a smile before you took a seat, feeling your stomach churn in discomfort.

“So, how long have you and Chris been dating?” RDJ asked while sipping on his lemonade, so happy that his good friend had found himself a good woman. “Three years” you smiled and chuckled when the rest of the cast broke out in a loud “aww!”, making the other people in the restaurant shoot you weird glances.

Chris had a proud smile on his face and then ordered your meals, already knowing what you got when eating outside. Everybody then erupted in different conversations, Benedict and Tom (Hiddleston) asked if you had ever been to England and happily recommended cities and restaurant you’d have to check out if you’d ever decide to visit the country.

Elizabeth quickly noticed Chadwick’s oddly quiet and calm demeanor and asked him if he was doing okay. “Are you sure? You’ve barely spoken a word since we came” Chris said with a concerned smile as he feared that his friend wasn’t doing well.

“I’m fine” Chadwick faked a smile and tried his best to not look at you, the whole situation just felt awkward to him and the last thing he wanted to do was draw everyone’s attention of him. You cleared your throat and slowly took a sip of your water.

“See, exes still can be cool around each other” Lupita mumbled and nodded her head towards you, not knowing that she just had dropped the bomb while the whole table got quiet. Everyone’s head snapping between you and Chadwick.

“W-What?” Chris softly asked while looking at you, his heart having skipped several beats while he tried his best to stay calm. Chadwick’s eyes widened as he then realized that you had never told Chris about you and him. It only made him more uncomfortable as now his friendship with your boyfriend was being jeopardized.

“Can we talk somewhere private?” you asked, hating that you were the center of attention. Chris nodded his head and then stood up. You copied his actions before the two of you walked out of the restaurant and back to the parking lot.

The second you were standing in front of Chris’s car he snapped.

“So, you and Chadwick, huh?” he hissed before running his hands through his soft hair, feeling angered and betrayed. You let out soft sigh as you hated being the reason for your boyfriend’s bad mood.

“Chris, it was years ago” you explained and frowned when the actor let out a loud huff while glaring at you. “We’ve been together for three years, [Y/N]. How come that you never felt the need to tell me that you dated one of my friends?!” Chris shook his head in disappointment.

“I-I…” was all you were able to mumble while feeling so ashamed and stupid.

“But you always held those big honesty is the key to a successful relationship speeches to me whenever I was struggling to come completely clean to you, [Y/N]” your boyfriend shook his head. His words hit you hard in the chest as he was telling nothing but the truth. Chris had exposed your hypocrisy and it left a bitter taste in your mouth.

You held those long and big speeches about honesty, loyalty, faithfulness and trust and always made him feel bad when he couldn’t confess whatever he was locking up inside him to you. But the joke was on you for keeping a pretty big secret away from him.

“Chris” you whispered speechless and ashamed. Your boyfriend shook his head when you took a step forward to hug him. “Don’t touch me, [Y/N]… I’m so hurt and disappointed….” His words made your heart shatter in your chest as you realized how much you had messed up.

“It was never my intention to hurt you” you confessed while swallowing the big lump in your throat, not knowing what to do or say in order to stop your boyfriend from hurting. Chris looked at you and clenched his jaw shut, suddenly feeling like he was looking at a stranger. He furrowed his eyebrows, “What else are you keeping away from me? Are there other secrets I should know about?”.

“Chris please don’t do this” you begged and took a step closer to him.

“Do what? Ask for your honesty, [Y/N]?” the way your name rolled harshly off his tongue made you bite your lip as you knew that he was mad. “I’m starting to question whether you’ve always been honest with me” Chris mumbled and scratched his neck, not having thought that this day would turn out to be a bad one.

“What can I do to make this up to you?” you begged, your stomach churning in discomfort while the shame and guilt still ate you alive.

“I need a few days to myself” Chris exclaimed, “I’m too angry and hurt to think straight so instead of doing something I might regret, I’m asking you to stay at your friend’s house while I collect my thoughts”.

You clenched your jaw while feeling your heart painfully clench in your chest. “O-Okay” you weakly whispered and watched the actor nod his head. It felt like your world had come crashing down, all because of you.

While Chris got into his car and quickly started his engine, you realized that you should have confessed your secret from the very beginning. It was manipulative and selfish from you to expect so many things from him while not putting the same amount of effort and energy into the things you kept preaching about.

With an aching heart and teary eyes, you got your phone out of your purse and ordered an Uber, wishing that you could go back in time and right your wrongs.

-Emmanuelle 💋❤️

Chadwick’s eyes widened as he then realized that you had never told Chris about you and him. It only made him more uncomfortable as now his friendship with your boyfriend was being jeopardized.

“Can we talk somewhere private?” you asked, hating that you were the center of attention. Chris nodded his head and then stood up. You copied his actions before the two of you walked out of the restaurant and back to the parking lot.

The second you were standing in front of Chris’s car he snapped.

“So, you and Chadwick, huh?” he hissed before running his hands through his soft hair, feeling angered and betrayed. You let out soft sigh as you hated being the reason for your boyfriend’s bad mood.

“Chris, it was years ago” you explained and frowned when the actor let out a loud huff while glaring at you. “We’ve been together for three years, [Y/N]. How come that you never felt the need to tell me that you dated one of my friends?!” Chris shook his head in disappointment.

“I-I…” was all you were able to mumble while feeling so ashamed and stupid.

“But you always held those big honesty is the key to a successful relationship speeches to me whenever I was struggling to come completely clean to you, [Y/N]” your boyfriend shook his head. His words hit you hard in the chest as he was telling nothing but the truth. Chris had exposed your hypocrisy and it left a bitter taste in your mouth.

You held those long and big speeches about honesty, loyalty, faithfulness and trust and always made him feel bad when he couldn’t confess whatever he was locking up inside him to you. But the joke was on you for keeping a pretty big secret away from him.

“Chris” you whispered speechless and ashamed. Your boyfriend shook his head when you took a step forward to hug him. “Don’t touch me, [Y/N]… I’m so hurt and disappointed….” His words made your heart shatter in your chest as you realized how much you had messed up.

“It was never my intention to hurt you” you confessed while swallowing the big lump in your throat, not knowing what to do or say in order to stop your boyfriend from hurting. Chris looked at you and clenched his jaw shut, suddenly feeling like he was looking at a stranger. He furrowed his eyebrows, “What else are you keeping away from me? Are there other secrets I should know about?”.

“Chris please don’t do this” you begged and took a step closer to him.

“Do what? Ask for your honesty, [Y/N]?” the way your name rolled harshly off his tongue made you bite your lip as you knew that he was mad. “I’m starting to question whether you’ve always been honest with me” Chris mumbled and scratched his neck, not having thought that this day would turn out to be a bad one.

“What can I do to make this up to you?” you begged, your stomach churning in discomfort while the shame and guilt still ate you alive.

“I need a few days to myself” Chris exclaimed, “I’m too angry and hurt to think straight so instead of doing something I might regret, I’m asking you to stay at your friend’s house while I collect my thoughts”.

You clenched your jaw while feeling your heart painfully clench in your chest. “O-Okay” you weakly whispered and watched the actor nod his head. It felt like your world had come crashing down, all because of you.

While Chris got into his car and quickly started his engine, you realized that you should have confessed your secret from the very beginning. It was manipulative and selfish from you to expect so many things from him while not putting the same amount of effort and energy into the things you kept preaching about.

With an aching heart and teary eyes, you got your phone out of your purse and ordered an Uber, wishing that you could go back in time and right your wrongs.

The two of you broke up due to you losing your feelings for one another. There had never been the hot and buzzing chemistry in between you and Chadwick, you simply went from friends to friends with benefits and then to a couple. But that was six years ago.

You had been with Chris for three years and knew that he was the love of your life, the only issue was that you had never told the actor about your relationship with Chadwick. A part of you knew that it wasn’t good to keep the tiny secret away from your boyfriend, but the other part of you always panicked when you even thought about confessing it to Chris.

“Hey, long time no see” Chadwick gave you a polite smile before sitting back at the table next to Lupita and Danai. You faked a smile before you took a seat, feeling your stomach churn in discomfort.

“I’m fine” Chadwick faked a smile and tried his best to not look at you, the whole situation just felt awkward to him and the last thing he wanted to do was draw everyone’s attention of him. You cleared your throat and slowly took a sip of your water.

“See, exes still can be cool around each other” Lupita mumbled and nodded her head towards you, not knowing that she just had dropped the bomb while the whole table got quiet. Everyone’s head snapping between you and Chadwick.

“Chris, it was years ago” you explained and frowned when the actor let out a loud huff while glaring at you. “We’ve been together for three years, [Y/N]. How come that you never felt the need to tell me that you dated one of my friends?!” Chris shook his head in disappointment.

“I-I…” was all you were able to mumble while feeling so ashamed and stupid.

“But you always held those big honesty is the key to a successful relationship speeches to me whenever I was struggling to come completely clean to you, [Y/N]” your boyfriend shook his head. His words hit you hard in the chest as he was telling nothing but the truth. Chris had exposed your hypocrisy and it left a bitter taste in your mouth.

You held those long and big speeches about honesty, loyalty, faithfulness and trust and always made him feel bad when he couldn’t confess whatever he was locking up inside him to you. But the joke was on you for keeping a pretty big secret away from him.

“Chris” you whispered speechless and ashamed. Your boyfriend shook his head when you took a step forward to hug him. “Don’t touch me, [Y/N]… I’m so hurt and disappointed….” His words made your heart shatter in your chest as you realized how much you had messed up.

“It was never my intention to hurt you” you confessed while swallowing the big lump in your throat, not knowing what to do or say in order to stop your boyfriend from hurting. Chris looked at you and clenched his jaw shut, suddenly feeling like he was looking at a stranger. He furrowed his eyebrows, “What else are you keeping away from me? Are there other secrets I should know about?”.

“Chris please don’t do this” you begged and took a step closer to him.

“Do what? Ask for your honesty, [Y/N]?” the way your name rolled harshly off his tongue made you bite your lip as you knew that he was mad. “I’m starting to question whether you’ve always been honest with me” Chris mumbled and scratched his neck, not having thought that this day would turn out to be a bad one.

“What can I do to make this up to you?” you begged, your stomach churning in discomfort while the shame and guilt still ate you alive.

“I need a few days to myself” Chris exclaimed, “I’m too angry and hurt to think straight so instead of doing something I might regret, I’m asking you to stay at your friend’s house while I collect my thoughts”.

You clenched your jaw while feeling your heart painfully clench in your chest. “O-Okay” you weakly whispered and watched the actor nod his head. It felt like your world had come crashing down, all because of you.

While Chris got into his car and quickly started his engine, you realized that you should have confessed your secret from the very beginning. It was manipulative and selfish from you to expect so many things from him while not putting the same amount of effort and energy into the things you kept preaching about.

With an aching heart and teary eyes, you got your phone out of your purse and ordered an Uber, wishing that you could go back in time and right your wrongs.

title: Anything Else Is Outside - Chapter 15
body:
A/N: Hopefully there’ll be another chapter tomorrow :)

Happy moments

“Are you nervous?”

“Of course not!”

“Your hand is wet, Chris”

They’re walking side by side and holding hands. There’s a short way to the restaurant and they decide to go walking.

“I may be a bit nervous, but that’s cause I’ll meet your niece”

“I bet that’s it” she smiles “He’s going to like you, you just can’t talk about football, that would be a huge mistake!”

“I can’t even think about football now that I know you’re a Titans fan..”

She stops in front of the restaurant, turning around to look at him. “If you feel like leaving the whole girlfriend and boyfriend out of the picture for now it’s okay with me. You know we can talk through things, right? I’m really easy going if I know what’s going know. Just don’t leave me in the dark and we’ll always be fine” Her own speech makes her feel like such a hypocrite…should she tell him the things Adam had said?

He hugs her and kisses her temple. “We’ll be just fine. I want to yell to the rooftops you’re my girlfriend, gorgeous. What reminds me I better have a talk to my publicist before she sees us in a magazine and bites my ass.”

“Aunt Harpiiiie!” the cutest little redhead yells before hugging her legs. Harper crouches to talk with the kid. “Hey love, how are you?”

“Great! I’m the best skater of the family! Dad said it!”

“Well, of your family I’m sure you are…but you still have to beat me to be the best of all the Followill’s. Are you up to a competition tomorrow?”

“Yes! That’s going to be awesome!”

“It will. Violet, this is Chris.”

“Hey Violet, how are you?”

“Are you my auntie’s boyfriend now?”

The adults smile awkwardly over the girl’s sincerity and he nods. “Yes, I am.”

“Hmm. Ok.” she keeps looking at him with a sweet smile.

“You must be Jessie.” He says stretching his hands to shake hers. “Yes. Nice to meet you. This is my husband Nathan.” The men also shake hands while Jessie and Harper hug.

It took about 20 minutes for them to start talking about football. Nathan started the topic, so she could not blame Chris. The dinner was nice and everyone had a great time. In the end, Chris walked with them to their hotel.

“We’ll leave you lovebirds to say goodbye. Nice to meet you, man! See you tomorrow, right?” Nathan says holding a sleeping Violet against his chest.

“Yes, I’ll meet you guys at the skiing track. It was great to meet you too, you have a beautiful family”.

“Thank you. Have a good night, Chris. See you tomorrow.” Jessie gives him a kiss and goes inside with her husband and daughter. Harper hugs him and talks in his ear. “Thank you, it was a great night.”

“It was really good. I like them. I like to see you with them…”

“Am I different?”

“Just more comfortable I guess.” He kisses her quickly and hugs her again. “Call me before you go to sleep?”

“Won’t you go out with the guys tonight?”

“I guess..but nothing big, maybe just have drinks at the hotel…call me.”

“Ok. Good night, sugar.”

“Night, babe”

They part ways and she goes straight to her room, but as soon as she closes the door, Jessie knocks “Hey, open up!” she does and her friend enters with a big smile. “Wow! You two look so good together, Har!”

“He’s such a great guy…” she says throwing herself at the bed. “And the sex…my god, he’s amazing”

“Good, you deserve amazing! So, it’s serious…I didn’t want to comment but he did say ‘girlfriend’ at one point.”

“Yes. He wants to be my boyfriend…” she smiles dreamily and hugs a pillow.

“I am so happy for you! After everything…you deserve this.”

“I think I’ll go to New York in January…he has some work there and wants me to stay with him…”

“Well, you do have some free time, and it’ll be good for you to leave Nashville for a bit, you know? I know you keep saying it’s past but Caleb does have an impact on you and I’m afraid this is not something that will ever go away..”

“I want him to be happy and I know he wants the same for me….it’s just hard sometimes; I feel like we’ll always have this sadness about things not working between us, you know? I don’t know if we’ll ever learn how to deal with it. But it’s not like we want to try anything at all, it’s just…”

“I get it, Har…I just feel like Lily wants to bring you to all this baby related things and I don’t think she does it on purpose, but I would rather see you doing your own things. Anyway…let’s focus on Chris! What about his house? His friends?”

“Oh my, don’t get me started on his friends!” she sits, facing Jessie “Should we have something to drink?”

“Yes, come, let’s go to my room, Nathan has a wine bottle and it’s going to spare me the trouble of repeating it all to him” Jessie stands from the bed and takes Harper hands, pulling her out of the bed. In Jessie’s room, they all got comfy at the bed, Nathan and Jessie leaning against the headboard and Harper resting between them on her stomach.

“So…I don’t know what to do. He has this friend, Adam, who’s an actor also…and is a fucker. He waits for Chris to leave so we can say how I’m his type and would like him better… I don’t want to cause drama but fuck, I hate him.”

“You should tell him.” Nathan says taking a sip of his wine.

“Yeah, I know…I will. Well, if he acts like that again I’ll do it.”





@mackevanstanfan80 @patzammit @xceafh

“I bet that’s it” she smiles “He’s going to like you, you just can’t talk about football, that would be a huge mistake!”

“I can’t even think about football now that I know you’re a Titans fan..”

She stops in front of the restaurant, turning around to look at him. “If you feel like leaving the whole girlfriend and boyfriend out of the picture for now it’s okay with me. You know we can talk through things, right? I’m really easy going if I know what’s going know. Just don’t leave me in the dark and we’ll always be fine” Her own speech makes her feel like such a hypocrite…should she tell him the things Adam had said?

He hugs her and kisses her temple. “We’ll be just fine. I want to yell to the rooftops you’re my girlfriend, gorgeous. What reminds me I better have a talk to my publicist before she sees us in a magazine and bites my ass.”

“Aunt Harpiiiie!” the cutest little redhead yells before hugging her legs. Harper crouches to talk with the kid. “Hey love, how are you?”

“Great! I’m the best skater of the family! Dad said it!”

“Well, of your family I’m sure you are…but you still have to beat me to be the best of all the Followill’s. Are you up to a competition tomorrow?”

“Yes! That’s going to be awesome!”

“It will. Violet, this is Chris.”

“Hey Violet, how are you?”

“Are you my auntie’s boyfriend now?”

The adults smile awkwardly over the girl’s sincerity and he nods. “Yes, I am.”

“Hmm. Ok.” she keeps looking at him with a sweet smile.

“You must be Jessie.” He says stretching his hands to shake hers. “Yes. Nice to meet you. This is my husband Nathan.” The men also shake hands while Jessie and Harper hug.

It took about 20 minutes for them to start talking about football. Nathan started the topic, so she could not blame Chris. The dinner was nice and everyone had a great time. In the end, Chris walked with them to their hotel.

“We’ll leave you lovebirds to say goodbye. Nice to meet you, man! See you tomorrow, right?” Nathan says holding a sleeping Violet against his chest.

“Yes, I’ll meet you guys at the skiing track. It was great to meet you too, you have a beautiful family”.

“Thank you. Have a good night, Chris. See you tomorrow.” Jessie gives him a kiss and goes inside with her husband and daughter. Harper hugs him and talks in his ear. “Thank you, it was a great night.”

“It was really good. I like them. I like to see you with them…”

“Am I different?”

“Just more comfortable I guess.” He kisses her quickly and hugs her again. “Call me before you go to sleep?”

“Won’t you go out with the guys tonight?”

“I guess..but nothing big, maybe just have drinks at the hotel…call me.”

“Ok. Good night, sugar.”

“Night, babe”

They part ways and she goes straight to her room, but as soon as she closes the door, Jessie knocks “Hey, open up!” she does and her friend enters with a big smile. “Wow! You two look so good together, Har!”

“He’s such a great guy…” she says throwing herself at the bed. “And the sex…my god, he’s amazing”

“Good, you deserve amazing! So, it’s serious…I didn’t want to comment but he did say ‘girlfriend’ at one point.”

“Yes. He wants to be my boyfriend…” she smiles dreamily and hugs a pillow.

“I am so happy for you! After everything…you deserve this.”

“I think I’ll go to New York in January…he has some work there and wants me to stay with him…”

“Well, you do have some free time, and it’ll be good for you to leave Nashville for a bit, you know? I know you keep saying it’s past but Caleb does have an impact on you and I’m afraid this is not something that will ever go away..”

“I want him to be happy and I know he wants the same for me….it’s just hard sometimes; I feel like we’ll always have this sadness about things not working between us, you know? I don’t know if we’ll ever learn how to deal with it. But it’s not like we want to try anything at all, it’s just…”

“I get it, Har…I just feel like Lily wants to bring you to all this baby related things and I don’t think she does it on purpose, but I would rather see you doing your own things. Anyway…let’s focus on Chris! What about his house? His friends?”

“Oh my, don’t get me started on his friends!” she sits, facing Jessie “Should we have something to drink?”

“Yes, come, let’s go to my room, Nathan has a wine bottle and it’s going to spare me the trouble of repeating it all to him” Jessie stands from the bed and takes Harper hands, pulling her out of the bed. In Jessie’s room, they all got comfy at the bed, Nathan and Jessie leaning against the headboard and Harper resting between them on her stomach.

“So…I don’t know what to do. He has this friend, Adam, who’s an actor also…and is a fucker. He waits for Chris to leave so we can say how I’m his type and would like him better… I don’t want to cause drama but fuck, I hate him.”

“You should tell him.” Nathan says taking a sip of his wine.

“Yeah, I know…I will. Well, if he acts like that again I’ll do it.”

summary: Can you explain how they make Chris Evans look so freaking tiny in CAFTA? I read an explanation in an article, and it was like...
question: Can you explain how they make Chris Evans look so freaking tiny in CAFTA? I read an explanation in an article, and it was like reading Chinese for some reason.
answer:
I mean, not exactly I can’t.  I’m not an expert in movie CGI.  But basically, they had him act out the scene how he felt it.  Then they had a small body double do it to get proportions and what not.  If they could, they just used the body double (that’s his chest in the going into the pod bit).  Otherwise, they used CGI to shrink Chris down to fit the space the body double was in.

Or at least that’s my understanding of the process as I’ve read it.  But like I said, not an expert.

Title: Have You Ever

Rating: E

Pairing: Chris Evans x Sebastian Stan

Word count: 3.1k

Summary: While filming Civil War in Europe, an innocent game of Truth or Dare takes a turn that Sebastian always hoped for but never quite believed would happen.

A/N: So idk where this came from and I’ve got eleventy billion other things to write but 🤷🏻‍♀️ just to clarify, this is not the watersports Evanstan fic that I teased a little while ago, though that’s in progress and should be done soon. This is just some good ol’ fashioned Evanstan smut that I felt like writing today 😂 hope you guys like it sjjsjsjs


—


It was late as hell and Sebastian was drunk, drunk enough to make some extremely questionable decisions and not give a single fuck as to whether he’d regret it in the morning. It explained why he was still in Chris’ hotel room long after the others had left, still playing Truth or Dare with Chris way after all the others had bowed out, sitting next to him on a small leather couch with their knees pressed casually together. He might die before the night was over but he really couldn’t think of a better way to go.

The game had devolved into a series of have you ever’s, dares not really coming into the equation anymore, and that was fine. Sebastian was having fun getting to know Chris better and Chris seemed to be doing the same, and Sebastian got comfortable enough to ask him things he’d never have the courage to ask him sober.


He couldn’t help it, really - sitting there so close to Chris, watching him throw his head back and laugh, watching his throat work as he drank on his beer, the way that he licked his lips and eyes lit up when he’d tell an outrageous story from back in Boston…. God Sebastian was smitten. He was already smitten, of course, but this… this made it so much worse.


And Chris, he was such a flirt. It came to him as naturally as breathing, and while Sebastian was used to it, he just didn’t know if Chris really meant it or if he just did it to do it. He wanted Chris to mean it, all those teasing little touches and playful looks he’d shoot Sebastian, but he only ever seemed to date women and Sebastian just needed to finally know.


And that was why, when it was Sebastian’s turn again, he finally blurted out the question he’d been wanting to ask Chris for months. Years even, maybe.


“You ever kiss a guy?”


Chris shook his head as he swallowed from his beer bottle, setting it between his legs. “Nope. Never.”


“Really? Never?” Sebastian asked, his hopes deflating a little. Surely if Chris wanted to experiment with a man, he’d have done so by now. “Not even… never?”


Chris chuckled and shook his head again. “Nah. You?”


Sebastian rolled his eyes. “You know I have.”


“Oh, right, the - your roles,” Chris nodded, gesturing vaguely with his hand. “But I mean, y’know - a real kiss.”


Sebastian blushed a little, looking down at his own beer nestled in his hands in his lap. “Yeah, I’ve, uh… yeah.”


“Yeah?”


Sebastian nodded, daring to peek at Chris, knowing he looked much shyer about it than he really was. “Yeah. A lot.”


“Oh.” Chris paused, cocking his head curiously. “I didn’t know.”


“Maybe there’s a lot you don’t know about me,” Sebastian grinned with a playfully mysterious look, and they both laughed at that. It didn’t stop Sebastian’s heart from racing, the current subject matter more than enough to make him fight breaking into a sweat.


“So, you’ve…”


“Hey, it’s my turn to ask a question,” Sebastian protested.


“You can just double up next time,” Chris waved him off. “So… you…”


Sebastian raised a brow. “I’ve…?”


“Slept with men,” Chris said, that curious glint still in his pretty blue eyes.


Sebastian blushed and wanted to scream a little, but he kept it all hidden inside. “Yeah.”


Chris eyed him silently, something in his expression that Sebastian couldn’t quite place. It made him even more nervous, a thrill running through his veins as he felt a little exposed, like Chris was examining him for… something.


Chris took another drink without taking his eyes off of Sebastian. Sebastian licked his lips and - oh God, Chris watched him do it and fuck -


“My turn,” Sebastian said a bit shakily, too shakily. “You ever thought about it?”


He didn’t need to specify what it was for Chris to get it. He blinked once, then twice, then looked away as he shrugged one massive shoulder and muttered, “I mean… everybody has, right?”


“But I mean really thought about it.”


Chris’ eyes snapped to Seb’s, the air between them growing more tense with each second that passed. “Few times.”


Sebastian’s stomach flipped. He had another question before it was Chris’ turn again, so he asked before he could think better of it, “Would you ever try it?”


“Maybe,” Chris answered surprisingly quickly. “With the right person.”


Sebastian was already getting hard in his jeans. Just talking about this with Chris and seeing the look on his face, the open curiosity, the hint of something else…


“How do you… what do you….” Chris faltered for a moment, unsure of how to ask his next question. Finally he just decided out with it. “You top or bottom?”


Sebastian’s heart skipped a few beats and he knew his face was on fire. “Both. But I like bottoming the most.”


Chris’ brows inches up fractionally and Seb could have sworn he heard him mutter a low fuck under his breath. Then he looked back at Sebastian and asked, “What’s it feel like?”


Sebastian had to look away to answer, briefly closing his eyes before taking a deep breath. “It’s… it’s really fucking good. It can be overwhelming. You feel so full and you just… you feel things you didn’t think were even possible. It’s addicting.”


It took awhile before Sebastian could bring himself to meet Chris’ gaze again. When he did he found Chris staring at him, expression maddeningly unreadable.


“Your turn,” Chris murmured.


“Why’re you so curious about me?”


Chris smirked a little bit, the bastard. “I’ve got my reasons.”


Sebastian wanted to groan and bang his head into the nearest hard surface, but instead he sighed and gestured for Chris to go next. He never could have prepared himself for what came next.


“If I asked you to come here… and let me try something… would you?”


Sebastian’s eyes flew to Chris’ in shock, finding the dark and slightly hungry look on his face and wondering if he’d fallen asleep and this was all a drunken dream. But even if it was, he was sure as hell gonna take advantage of it. “I… yeah, fuck.”


Chris then set his beer aside and adjusted a little where he sat, widening his legs a little and giving a tiny, somehow arousing jerk of his head. “C’mere.”


Sebastian went to him so fast he would later remember nothing about it, seemingly teleporting himself on to Chris’ lap before he could so much as draw a breath. He straddled those wonderfully muscular thighs and watched as Chris looked him over, his hands cautiously coming to rest on Sebastian’s denim-clad hips. Sebastian wasn’t sure what to do with his hands so he held on to the back of the couch with one hand and let the other hang at his sides.


Neither of them spoke at first, Chris slowly letting his hands drift up Sebastian’s sides. “Fuck,” Chris muttered appreciatively as he dragged his eyes up Seb’s torso, watching his own hands move up. “You’ve gotten so fuckin’ big.”


Sebastian shuddered, fairly sure he could come just from Chris’ innocent touches and his words. “Yeah, trying… tryin’ to keep up with you,” he replied breathlessly.


Chris grinned up at him briefly before slowly dragging Sebastian’s shirt up, exposing his hard-earned abs. He kept moving the fabric up, up, up until it had nowhere to go but off, and suddenly Sebastian found himself shirtless in Chris’ lap.


Chris leaned back an inch or two to fully take him in, getting braver with his hands as he placed them on Sebastian’s stomach and let them feel him, slowly moving upwards. “You’re fucking gorgeous, Seb. Always thought so.”


Sebastian made some kind of noise in his throat like the wind had been knocked out of him, his hand on the couch slipping down to grip Chris’ shoulder. Chris didn’t seem to mind, though he was preoccupied with sliding his palms over Sebastian’s impressive pecs. “Chris -“


Then those hands were on Seb’s shoulders, fingers gently and briefly touching the ends of his long hair before trailing down his broad back. Sebastian’s skin erupted into flame everywhere Chris touched him, every point of contact going straight to his cock and making him feel like he might burst at any moment. He was sure that he’d never been so turned on, and they hadn’t even kissed.


Chris’ hands ended up on Sebastian’s ass, gripping it through his jeans, and the little gasp that left Sebastian’s lips made Chris grin and lean his head forward. Sebastian felt hot breath on his chest and his entire body tensed, cock throbbing in his jeans as Chris squeezed, lips just barely brushing his skin…


Then Chris slid his hands into Sebastian’s jeans, gripping his ass hard and pulling him closer, rocking them together through their jeans, and Sebastian moaned because it felt so good and Chris was hard too, but nothing could have prepared him for the sudden flick of a hot tongue on a sensitive nipple.

Chris pulled away to look up into Sebastian’s already-wrecked face, Chris’ pupils dilated and cheeks flushed and yeah, God he was into this, too. “You’re so hard, Seb…”


“So are you,” Sebastian retorted, voice low and broken-sounding as he rocked in Chris’ lap, the friction as delicious as it was frustrating. Chris dug his fingers in hard as a reply, and Sebastian moaned and hoped there’d be bruises later.

trail.content_abstract:
Title: Have You Ever

Rating: E

Pairing: Chris Evans x Sebastian Stan

Word count: 3.1k

Summary: While filming Civil War in Europe, an innocent game of Truth or Dare takes a turn that Sebastian always hoped for but never quite believed would happen.

A/N: So idk where this came from and I’ve got eleventy billion other things to write but 🤷🏻‍♀️ just to clarify, this is not the watersports Evanstan fic that I teased a little while ago, though that’s in progress and should be done soon. This is just some good ol’ fashioned Evanstan smut that I felt like writing today 😂 hope you guys like it sjjsjsjs


—


It was late as hell and Sebastian was drunk, drunk enough to make some extremely questionable decisions and not give a single fuck as to whether he’d regret it in the morning. It explained why he was still in Chris’ hotel room long after the others had left, still playing Truth or Dare with Chris way after all the others had bowed out, sitting next to him on a small leather couch with their knees pressed casually together. He might die before the night was over but he really couldn’t think of a better way to go.

summary: ok, so I was at the bus stop with this woman and she asked if I knew when the bus was. I got the live map up and showed her...
body:
ok, so I was at the bus stop with this woman and she asked if I knew when the bus was. I got the live map up and showed her where the bus was, then I clicked off the app and the lady saw my homescreen. She complimented me on having such a nice photo of my boyfriend and how handsome he was. I just automatically replied with “aww thank you 😊”. So long story short, I’m dating Chris Evans. This is probably the biggest compliment I’ve ever gotten and will ever get.

This was the photo

summary:
HOME | THE PREMISE | DESIGNATIONS | APP FORM | CLAIMS | SKELETONS

                                                           ...
caption:
HOME | THE PREMISE | DESIGNATIONS | APP FORM | CLAIMS | SKELETONS

                                        Order born from the wrath of chaos

Chicago Illinois, a city rebuilt and protected by PRIME. It is an organization tasked with policing both the Conduit species itself and maintaining the peace between it and mankind. Having bought out the privatized contract for law enforcement throughout all of Chicago; they have kept the peace within the city. Well, for the most part. The Mavericks, a group that has seen PRIME’s methods and control have begun to rebel against the organization. They Are willing to do anything to maintain their freedom and remove PRIME from the city. They are not alone, however, and when motivations within the city collide; everyone has to pick a side, even if its the wrong one.

                                                                                          CHAOS WILL ALWAYS TRIUMPH OVER ORDER

SEQUENCE is a mutant/abilities roleplay. This group contains mature themes and is rated as such. We accept OCs and Skeleton Canon characters. We concern ourselves with our members enjoying themselves having a great place to plot, post and have fun with each other. If this sounds right up your alley, feel free to check us out and ask any questions you might have.

     Accepting within twenty four hours of receiving application!
